response.original_title: Gods & Goddesses of India: Divine Stories for Children
response.overview: Hindu gods and goddesses come to life in this enchanting collection of beautifully animated tales for children, which impart important spiritual lessons and provide a fascinating overview of Hindu mythology. Children will learn about Shiva and Parvarti's elephant-headed son, Ganesha; how Vishnu takes on various forms to aid people in need; the luck, triumph and wealth Lakshmi provides; and the devotion and power of monkey warrior Hanuman.
response.title: Gods & Goddesses of India: Divine Stories for Children
